arm_group.description: Communities in which male-focused group prevention activities will not be conducted

brief_summary.textblock:
Cluster randomized controlled trial to evaluate a male-focused primary prevention programme
      which used a men's only group discussion format to prevent intimate partner violence against
      women & girls through fostering knowledge and behaviour changes by: (1) increasing men's
      knowledge on the impact of violence against women; (2) promoting gender equitable
      beliefs/behaviours within relationships; and (3) developing anger management techniques.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of a Male-focused Intervention to Prevent Intimate Partner Violence in a Conflict-affected Setting

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  15+ years old

          -  males: participant in group intervention or selected as control

          -  females: female intimate partner of males in intervention or selected as control

          -  capable of completing face-to-face interview independently and without    causing
             undue psychological distress

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  lack of informed consent

clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of a Male-focused Primary Prevention Intervention to Prevent Intimate Partner Violence in a Conflict-affected Setting: A Cluster Randomized Controlled Trial in Cote d'Ivoire

primary_outcome.measure: Past 12 months victimisation/perpetration of physical or sexual intimate partner violence

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine

clinical_study.source: London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine

lead_sponsor.agency: London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Prevention
